inclusion.criterion: Residual measurable disease in partial remission or with stable disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eligible to undergo an autologous stem cell transplant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease defined by quantifiable serum or urinary M protein or free light chains in the presence of a positive immunofixation or bone marrow plasma cells > 5%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prior lenalidomide therapy with >= partial response (PR) observed on a prior lenalidomide containing regimen and patients did not progress while receiving lenalidomide
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Minimum period of two weeks elapsed following the prior myeloma therapy; this does not include therapy with bisphosphonates
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status =< 2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No clinical evidence of uncontrolled viral, fungal, bacterial infection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative serology for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum bilirubin =< 1.5 times upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase (SGOT)/serum glutamic pyruvic transaminase (SGPT) =< 3x ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Calculated creatinine clearance >= 60ml/min by Cockcroft-Gault formula; creatinine clearance >= 60 ml/min or serum creatinine =< 2.0 mg/dL
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known or suspected hypersensitivity to azacitidine or mannitol
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with residual measurable disease and meets several inclusion criteria. However, she is pregnant which is an exclusion criterion.
